properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADD, MEMBER_ADMIN, MEMBER_PNO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=? AND MEMBER_PW=? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NM = ? AND MEMBER_PNO = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NM=? AND MEMBER_PNO=? AND MEMBER_ID=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NM = ? AND MEMBER_PNO = ? AND MEMBER_ID = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW=? WHERE MEMBER_ID=?
UPDATE COUPON SET COUPON_ST = 'Y' WHERE COUPON_NO = ( SELECT MIN(COUPON_NO) FROM COUPON WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND COUPON_ST = 'N' ) AND MEMBER_NO = ? AND COUPON_DT >= SYSDATE AND COUPON_ST = 'N'
